Posts.Content: Does anyone know of an at-home test to detect blood cancer or detect a recurrence? I have heard there were some under development like the Cologuard but have only seen this one so far https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/agkura-blood-test-to-moni Would like to know if anyone has heard or tried anything? I am TNBC survivor 7 years.
Posts.Title: blood test to detect cancer
